                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/schema",
  "$id": "#User",
  "type": "object",
  "description": "The user object.",
  "properties": {
    "ChangeBy": {
      "type": "number",
      "readOnly": true
    },
    "ChangeTime": {
      "type": "string",
      "readOnly": true
    },
    "CreateBy": {
      "type": "number",
      "readOnly": true
    },
    "CreateTime": {
      "type": "string",
      "readOnly": true
    },
    "UserEmail": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "UserFirstname": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "UserFullname": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "UserID": {
      "type": "number",
      "readOnly": true
    },
    "UserLastname": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "UserLogin": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "UserTitle": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "ValidID": {
      "type": "number"
    },
    "Preferences": {
      "type": "array",
      "item": {
        "$ref": "#UserPreference"
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "ChangeBy",
    "ChangeTime",
    "CreateBy",
    "CreateTime",
    "UserID",
    "UserFirstname",
    "UserLastname",
    "UserLogin"
  ]
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Example:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        {
    "User": { 
        "ChangeBy": 1,
        "ChangeTime": "2018-09-28 09:17:03",
        "CreateBy": 1,
        "CreateTime": "2018-08-28 11:34:55",
        "UserEmail": "john.doe@example.com",
        "UserFirstname": "John",
        "UserFullname": "John Doe",
        "UserID": 3,
        "UserLastname": "Doe",
        "UserLogin": "jdoe",
        "UserTitle": "Dr.",
        "ValidID": 1
    }
}

          "type": "string"
        },
        "UserPw": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "UserTitle": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "ValidID": {
          "type": "number"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "User"
  ]
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • DELETE: the item could not be deleted because depending items exist.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            /users/{userId}/preferences get post

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A collection of UserPreference items.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Create a new UserPreference.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Secured by webToken

    "Name": {
      "type": "string",
      "readOnly": true
    }
  }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  { 
    "Valid": {
        "ID": 2,
        "Name": "invalid"
    }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  HTTP status code 404

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The requested item could not be found.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Media type: application/json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Type: Error

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  {
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/schema",
  "$id": "#Error",
  "type": "object",
  "description": "An error object.",
  "properties": {
    "Code": {
      "type": "string",
      "readOnly": true
    },
    "Message": {
      "type": "string",
      "readOnly": true
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "Code",
    "Message"
  ]
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Example:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  {
    "Code": "Object.DependingObjectExists",
    "Message": "Cannot delete queue. A ticket with this queue already exists."
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Secured by webToken

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Headers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Parameter
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  		TypeSpecialDescription
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Authorization
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  yes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  		string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • pattern:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Token <Token>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Used to send the token

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Possible Responses

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  HTTP status code 401

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Unauthorized. The given token is invalid.
